name: VoidRabbit
description:
My first Ludum Dare Project! Maybe there is some mistake about uploading.

A monster born in the white liquid and it eat a lot of rabbits, then it became a rabbit.

But it still didn't have its own will until he ate first person. He kept killing and eating, absorbing the knowledge and power. He lives in the world but don't what to do, except eating. He still seems to be staying in the void.

PC Controls:

 

WASD or Arrow Keys  - Movement:

Z - To hear the danger

E - Fight hand-to-hand

F - Shoot 

Space - Next line of text （sometime）
